title: Amazon goes on warehouse hiring spree
description:
(2 Aug 2017) Amazon is holding a giant job fair and plans to make thousands of job offers on the spot at nearly a dozen US warehouses. 
Its hiring spree on Wednesday is a sign of Amazon's growth at a time when traditional retailers are closing stores and cutting jobs.
Nearly 40,000 of the 50,000 packing, sorting and shipping jobs available will be full time.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/ed8cee60ced7b981d4613ed802fe06bd 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
